title: Yo quisiera
overview: Lana is a 16-year-old girl with a taste for fashion and new trends. Through the blog 'Yo Quisiera' she has managed to become famous despite keeping her identity anonymous. André is a young man who starts working in the school cafeteria, dazzling with his image and charisma. Lana falls in love with him when she discovers him singing at the piano in the school's music room. André has the desire to make a musical career as a singer on his own, moving away from the contacts of his father, the film director Víctor Vegas. Lana's best friends will convince André to turn to her to promote himself as a singer on social networks, for Lana it is a good excuse to be close to him.
